feed.title: Twisted Tensor's Blog
feed.subtitle: This site is for me to share data science projects I'm working on, other nerdy stuff, and random thoughts.

entry.title: New Year, New Blog
entry.summary: Why am I doing this? This is my first post on this blog and I wanted to start by trying to articulate my reasons for creating this blog and then do a little brainstorming about what kind of content I want to share here. I’m sure things will change as I continue to work on this and what I actually end up doing may look very different, but I have start somewhere. As a data scientist, I am very c...
